title: Online Interaction-Based Inquiry Learning Design: Language Practitioner Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Online Learning Platform Proficiency and Over 3 Years of Language Education Practical Experience
context.additional_context: A course focused on acquiring interactive skills applicable to real-world work environments, integrating the use of H5P content creation tools and Moodle LMS.

learning_goals: Learners can generate three or more questions that promote critical thinking in online discussions using a 6-stage inquiry learning model
Learners can develop two or more practical materials for language education using H5P interactive content creation technology
Learners can establish a peer feedback system among learners by designing collaborative activities on the Moodle LMS

resources: Digital resource package for language practice

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
